AICreatureFigures - Class in creatures
The AICreatureFigures class uses a depth-first search inspired algorithm to help an AttackingPlayer's current horde traverse a level given to the AttackingPlayer class.
AICreatureFigures(AttackingPlayer) - Constructor for class creatures.AICreatureFigures
AICreatureFigures constructor.
AIDefendingPlayer - Class in towers
The AIDefendingPlayer class is the brain behind the opponent, that is the player which creates towers in order to prevent the real player from having its horde reach the goal(s).
AIDefendingPlayer.Builder - Class in towers
The Builder class is used to instantiate a AIDefendingPlayer object with various obligatory and customisable parameters.
AIMemory - Class in towers
AIMemory handles everything to do with the memory processing of the AIDefendingPlayer.
AIMemory.AIMemoryLoader - Class in towers
AIMemoryLoader load the most adequate memory.
AIMemory.AIMemoryLoader.Errors - Enum in towers
 
AIMemoryLoader(int) - Constructor for class towers.AIMemory.AIMemoryLoader
Creates a loading class for the AIMemory class, loads memories and instantiates an AIMemory object with the most adequate memory.

AreaPosition - Class in start
The AreaPosition class describes all possible positions counting from the a specific position and outward (delta).

AttackingPlayer - Class in creatures
The AttackingPlayer class holds the information regarding the attacking player's current horde, and the credits and points which have been spent and earned during an ongoing game session.
